title: Check whether E5373s-155 has been successfully installed
answer:
1. Click![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39154)  and find “My Computer” as![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39155) . Right click “My Computer” select “Manage” to open the “Computer Management” Click “![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39156)”. If E5373s-155 has been installed successfully, You would see one new “com port” and “HUAWEI Mobil Connect – Network Adapter” displayed in![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39157).![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39158) 

 If “HUAWEI Mobil Connect – Network Adapter” shows![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39159), right click it then select “Uninstall”. Re-load the network driver for E5373s-155 by right click![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39160), then select “Scan for hardware changes”.
